entry.title: The Surface Waters (Fishlife) (Classification) Regulations 1997
entry.summary: These Regulations prescribe a system for classifying the quality of inland freshwaters which need protection or improvement in order to support fish life.

entry.title: Pesticides (Maximum Residue Levels in Crops, Food and Feeding Stuffs) (EEC Limits) (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1997
entry.summary: These Regulations, are made under section 2(2) of the European Communities Act 1972, and further amend the Pesticides (Maximum Residue Levels in Crops, Food and Feeding Stuffs) (EEC Limits) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1995 (“the principal Regulations”) (S.R. 1995 No. 33, amended by S.R. 1995 No. 461 and S.R. 1996 No. 527).

entry.title: The Merchant Shipping (Safe Manning, Hours of Work and Watchkeeping) Regulations 1997
entry.summary: These Regulations give effect to the International Convention on Standards of Training, Certification and Watchkeeping (STCW) for Seafarers', 1978, as amended on 7th July 1995.

entry.title: The Surface Waters (Shellfish) (Classification) Regulations 1997
entry.summary: These Regulations prescribe a system for classifying the quality of controlled waters which are coastal or brackish waters and which need protection or improvement in order to support shellfish life and growth.

entry.title: The Finance Act 1997, Schedule 6, Paragraph 7, (Appointed Day) Order 1997
The Local Government (General Grant) Order (Northern Ireland) 1997
The Driving Licences (Community Driving Licence) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1997
entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Road Traffic Offenders (Northern Ireland) Order 1996 (“the 1996 Order”) so as to give effect to Council Directive 91/439/EEC of 29th July 1991 on driving licences (O.J. No. L237, 24.8.91, p. 1). The Directive applies, by virtue of Decision 7/94 of the EEA Joint Committee (O.J. No. L160, 28.6.94, p. 1) to states within the European Economic Area.

entry.title: The Building Societies Act 1997 (Commencement No. 1) Order 1997
The Wiltshire Health Authority (Transfers of Trust Property) Order 1997

ukm:Subject.Value: NATIONAL HEALTH SERVICE, ENGLAND AND WALES

category.term: NATIONAL HEALTH SERVICE, ENGLAND AND WALES

entry.summary: This Order transfers on 12th June 1997 to the National Health Service trusts specified in the Schedule to the Order trust property held by the Wiltshire Health Authority (article 2).

entry.title: Seeds (Miscellaneous Amendments) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1997
entry.summary: These Regulations implement as respects Northern Ireland—

entry.title: The Southern Sea Fisheries District (Constitution of Committee and Expenses) (Variation) Order 1997
entry.summary: This Order varies those provisions of the Southern Sea Fisheries District Order 1989 which relate to the constitution of the Committee and the expenses payable by the constituent authorities, in consequence of the changes to the Local Government areas contained in the Isle of Wight (Structural Change) Order 1994 (S.I. 1994/1210), the Dorset (Boroughs of Poole and Bournemouth) (Structural Change) Order 1995 (S.I. 1995/1771) and the Hampshire (Cities of Portsmouth & Southampton) (Structural Change) Order 1995 (S.I. 1995/1775).

entry.title: The Flood Prevention and Land Drainage (Scotland) Act 1997 (Commencement) Order 1997
entry.summary: In terms of section 9(2) and (3) of the Flood Prevention and Land Drainage (Scotland) Act 1997 (“the Act”), sections 6(1), 7 and 9 came into force on the passing of the Act (21st March 1997) and section 6(2) will come into force on 1st April 1999. This Order brings the remainder of the Act into force on 26th May 1997, with the exception of section 2 (which is brought into force on 28th July 1997) and certain repeals in the Schedule (which are brought into force on 1st April 1999).

entry.title: The Road Vehicles (Construction and Use) (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 1997
The European Parliamentary(United Kingdom Representatives) Pensions (Amendment) Order 1997
The Health and Personal Social Services (Superannuation) (Provision of Information and Administrative Expenses etc.) (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1997
entry.summary: These Regulations are made under Articles 164 and 166(3) of the Pensions (Northern Ireland) Order 1995 and amend the Health and Personal Social Services (Superannuation) (Provision of Information and Administrative Expenses etc.) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1997 (S.R. 1997 No. 101), (“the Provision of Information Regulations”).

entry.title: The M6 Birmingham To Carlisle Motorway (at Haighton) Special Roads Scheme 1997 Transfer Order 1997
The M6 Birmingham to Carlisle Motorway (At Haighton) Connecting Roads Scheme 1997
Health and Safety (Miscellaneous Fees Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1997
Education (Individual Pupils' Achievements) (Information) (Amendment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1997

category.term: Special educational needs and additional support

entry.summary: These Regulations amend the Education (Individual Pupils' Achievements) (Information) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1995.

entry.title: Health and Safety (Enforcing Authority) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1997
entry.summary: These Regulations revoke and replace the Health and Safety (Enforcing Authority) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 1993 (“the 1993 Regulations”) with amendments. The 1993 Regulations, which applied only to non-domestic premises, made provision with respect to enforcement by district councils of the Health and Safety at Work (Northern Ireland) Order 1978 (“the 1978 Order”) and the other relevant statutory provisions within the meaning of the 1978 Order (“the relevant statutory provisions”) and also specified the premises in respect of which the Department of Agriculture and the Department of Economic Development would be the enforcing authorities under the afore-mentioned legislation.
